underlying_goal: To add a scheduled daily auto-update script for AI tools and integrate `bun` as a package manager for Linux remote servers.
primary_success: Incorporated user feedback and a Codex critique to create a robust, cross-platform implementation plan for a new feature, correctly identifying and addressing subtle issues like launchd PATH and per-tool installation method detection.
brief_summary: The user proposed adding a scheduled update script for AI tools. Claude explored the existing codebase, created a comprehensive implementation plan, and then iteratively refined it based on user feedback (adding Linux/bun support) and a critique from another AI (Codex). The final plan correctly handled cross-platform scheduling, environment differences, and installation-method detection.
